text: Richard Irving may refer to: *Richard Irving (cricketer) (born 1969), New Zealand cricketer *Richard Irving (footballer) (born 1975), English football (soccer) player *Richard Irving (director), American director, producer and actor in Masada and The Name of the Game ==See also== *Richard Irving Dodge (1827–1895), U.S. army officer *Dick Irvin (1892–1957), Canadian ice hockey player *Dick Irvin Jr. (born 1932), Canadian sportscaster and author
title: Richard Irving
